Pool ID: 52ffc8b767d55223231209643812d8de18685a4b0388ff08a7575803 Pool Ticker: DNND Pool Location: Indiana USA Email: dananodeada@gmail.com 2- Buy Cardano, Ada, into your online exchange account 3- Download Cardano wallet like Yoroi or Daedalus... 4- Transfer Ada from your exchange wallet to your Yoroi wallet address Test a transfer with small amount, check it in Yoroi then do your main transfer 5- In your Yoroi wallet, go to Delegation List, search for DNND ,
          and click delegate, , Verify DNND with pool.vet DNND in detail on AdaStat DNND in detail on pool.pm
